income_messages:
From: p********e@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-01 17:18:44
SUBJECT:   Greetings
  Greetings
I represent Gulf Region Base Investment loan Company, we are currently
expanding our Loan Funding portfolio outside of the gulf Region, in
the following sectors, Oil/Gas, construction, Real Estate, Stock
Speculation and Mining, Transportation, Health Sector and Tobacco,
Communication Services, Agriculture Forestry & Fishing, thus any
sector, mainly interested in debt finance {pure loan}.
Let me know your position on this briefing as soon as possible for more details
Waiting for your response
Regards,
Mr. Patrick Colle   
From: p********e@gmail.com
To: wt87510@m**************p
Time: 2023-03-01 18:39:52
SUBJECT: Re: Loan Funding Detailed Information
Dear Mr. Steven
Your email message was received and acknowledges.
However I write to acknowledge receipt of your email message analysis and
wish to clarify and further explain as follows; we invite you to benefit
from our new Loan and Project funding referral program. We provide
investment capital for companies/ individuals to finance their business or
viable projects using our alternative finance structure without the usual
rigorous and stringent conditions experienced in the banks and some other
lending institutions.
Our Arabs Investors allows us to present loan requests ranging from
$1Million to $100 Billion Dollars. As long as it is a viable proposal, the
investors are willing to jointly invest with us. Investors however will be
doing all the necessary DD and risk assessment for any proposal we present.
If you think your firm will do better with our funding program; then email
us your business plan executive summary for our review and consideration.
What our investors want in return is a sustainable interest repayment on
the investment capital.
We would be Interested to provide funding for you at an interest rate of 3%
per annum for a period of 5-30 years. {Pure loan/Funding} We will be glad
to hear from you on any potential opportunity for onward consideration.
Regards,
Mr.  Paul Collins
Investment accredited broker
Tel: +44 748 285 7218
+44 748 285 7218 (WhatsApp)
From: p********e@gmail.com
To: wt87510@m**************p
Time: 2023-03-03 03:48:06
SUBJECT: Re: Loan Funding Detailed Information
Dear Mr. Steven
Is obvious you don’t understand my email clearly.
Please call the number below my signature or better still chat me on
whatsapp for chat discussion.
Regards,
Mr. Patrick Colle
Investment accredited broker
Tel: +44 748 285 7218
+44 748 285 7218 (WhatsApp)
